blogPost.title: What should aspiring filmmakers know about getting their movie made? Answer by Joe Raffa, writer and director. https://t.co/TsT6YVbudU https://t.co/bzEyn5Pyt5
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: 映画監督を目指す人が、映画を作るために知っておくべきことは何ですか？Answer by Joe Raffa, writer and director. https://t.co/TsT6YVbudU https://t.co/bzEyn5Pyt5
有抱负的电影人在制作电影时应该知道什么？回答者：Joe Raffa，作家兼导演。https://t.co/TsT6YVbudU https://t.co/bzEyn5Pyt5
有抱負的電影人在製作電影時應該知道什麼？回答者：Joe Raffa，作家兼導演。https://t.co/TsT6YVbudU https://t.co/bzEyn5Pyt5

previous.title: What should all women know about breast cancer risk? Answer by @KatePickert, Author of Radical: The Science, Culture and History of Breast Cancer in America. https://t.co/ediN5AFRiW https://t.co/Z4PhpELaRD

localize.full_text: 乳がんのリスクについて、すべての女性が知っておくべきことは？Answer by @KatePickert, Author of Radical: The Science, Culture and History of Breast Cancer in America. https://t.co/ediN5AFRiW https://t.co/Z4PhpELaRD
关于乳腺癌风险，所有妇女都应该知道什么？回答者：@KatePickert，《激进：美国乳腺癌的科学、文化和历史》作者。https://t.co/ediN5AFRiW https://t.co/Z4PhpELaRD
關於乳腺癌風險，所有婦女都應該知道什麼？回答者：@KatePickert，《激進：美國乳腺癌的科學、文化和歷史》作者。https://t.co/ediN5AFRiW https://t.co/Z4PhpELaRD

next.title: Why is diversity important in data science? Answer by Ashok Srivastava, Chief Data Officer @Intuit. https://t.co/gByUpyN258 https://t.co/38LDi6mjdY

localize.full_text: データサイエンスではなぜ多様性が重要なのでしょうか？Answer by Ashok Srivastava, Chief Data Officer @Intuit. https://t.co/gByUpyN258 https://t.co/38LDi6mjdY
为什么多样性在数据科学中很重要？回答者：Ashok Srivastava，首席数据官@Intuit。https://t.co/gByUpyN258 https://t.co/38LDi6mjdY
爲什麼多樣性在數據科學中很重要？回答者：Ashok Srivastava，首席數據官@Intuit。https://t.co/gByUpyN258 https://t.co/38LDi6mjdY
